Description: The Femur of Fury.  Useful for mangling mosquitos.
An ancient blade of mythical strength.
Born of fire and hand-hewn for a knight.
The ultimate sword, forged from neutronium.
Hack and slash with this ancient claw.
Solid and strong, heavy enough to crush boulders.
Pulverize your enemies with this antique armor-splitter.
If it worked for the first Olympians, it'll work for you.
Strong enough for a knight, but you'll like it too.
